fixed_culture()

returns: a String

[Source]

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/methods/get_vocabulary/vocabulary_parameters.rb, line 50
50:         def fixed_culture
51:           return @children['fixed-culture'][:value]
52:         end
fixed_culture=(value)

REQUIRED summary: If fixed-culture is set to false, the platform shall look for the vocabulary items for the culture info specified in the request header. If items are not found for the specified culture, items for the default fallback culture are returned. If fixed-culture is set to true, fallback will not occur and if items are not found for the specified culture empty strings will be returned. value is a String

[Source]

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/methods/get_vocabulary/vocabulary_parameters.rb, line 45
45:         def fixed_culture=(value)
46:           @children['fixed-culture'][:value] = value
47:         end
remove_vocabulary_key(value)

value is a HealthVault::WCData::Vocab::VocabularyKey

[Source]

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/methods/get_vocabulary/vocabulary_parameters.rb, line 26
26:         def remove_vocabulary_key(value)
27:             @children['vocabulary-key'][:value].delete(value)
28:         end
vocabulary_key()

REQUIRED summary: The unique key used to identify the vocabulary. remarks: If the family is not specified in the vocabulary key, the system looks for a vocabulary with the specified name in the HealthVault Vocabularies family. If the version is not specified in the vocabulary key, the system returns the most current version of the vocabulary. returns: a HealthVault::WCData::Vocab::VocabularyKey Array

[Source]
